name: 史蒂夫·佩姆伯顿 Steve Pemberton
intro: Steve James Pemberton[1] (born 1 September 1967) is an English actor, comedian, writer and performer, most famous as a member of The League of Gentlemen along with fellow performers Reece Shearsmith, Mark Gatiss and co-writer Jeremy Dyson.
birthplace: 英国,英格兰,兰开夏郡,布莱克本
